entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 before morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 29 January 2023
